item.title: I-80 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 129 - UT-186 West/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 129 - Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: UT-186 West at US-89
item.description: UT-186 West (W 400 S) at US-89 (State St.) in Salt Lake City. Turn right to continue west on UT-186; continue straight for north US-89.

item.title: UT-186 West Approaching US-89
item.description: UT-186 West (W 400 S) approaching US-89 (State St.).

item.title: UT-186 West (Foothill Drive) at UT-282
item.description: UT-186 West (Foothill Drive) at UT-282 to University of Utah, Fort Douglas, and the University Childrens Hospital. Continue on Foothill Drive for the Veterans Administration Hospital.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 129 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West Exit 129 offramp at UT-186. Use right lane for UT-186 West/Foothill Rive. Use left lane for West Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 130 and 129
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 130 - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 129 - UT-186/Foothill Drive. Continue west on I-80 for Salt Lake City/SLC International Airport.

item.title: US-89 North at UT-186
item.description: US-89 North at UT-186 (Victory Way) in Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 129 - UT-186 West/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 130 and 129
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 130 - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 129 - UT-186/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way. Next 8 exits on I-80 west are for Salt Lake. The UT-186 shield is an old style Utah state highway shield.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 129 - UT-186 West/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 East At Exit 128 and Approaching Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Approaching Exit 129 - Foothill Drive/Parleys Way. I-80 continues east towards Cheyenne.
